title: Wolf Tooth Frozen Ti Morse Cage
content:
Over the past several years, Wolf Tooth has put out some really fun limited edition finishes on its titanium Morse Cages. This winter, the Minneapolis-based manufacturer has unveiled this killer “Frozen” motif. Like other limited edition Morse cages, these will definitely sell out, so if you’re looking for something fun as a last-minute gift or a final detail on your latest custom build, check out the Frozen Morse Cages at Wolf Tooth.

The post Wolf Tooth Frozen Ti Morse Cage appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
